Rows 2, 6, 7 (early liver failure), 8 (end-stage liver failure), 9 (uremia), 10 (congenital afibrinogenemia), 11 (factor v deficiency), and 12 (factor x deficiency as seen in amyloid purpura) have prolonged prothrombin time but none of them have decreased platelet count or unaffected bleeding time.
